años de experiencia en el sector.

Desde pequeño me ha gustado la informática y siempre he estado interesado en aprender sobre diferentes tecnologías.

Me apasiona el código legible y que sea sencillo de modificar, ya que creo que es fundamental para el desarrollo de software de calidad.

en.aboutme:
years of experience in the sector.

Since I was a child, I have liked computing and I have always been interested in learning about different technologies.

I am passionate about readable code that is easy to modify, as I believe it is fundamental for the development of quality software.
